abstract: A music item that represents a music video.

# MusicVideo

**Structure**

A music item that represents a music video.

## Declaration

```swift
struct MusicVideo
```

## Instance Properties

- **albumTitle**: The title of the album the music video appears on.
- **albums**: The music video’s associated albums.
- **artistName**: The artist’s name.
- **artistURL**: The artist’s URL.
- **artists**: The music video’s associated artists.
- **artwork**: The artwork for the music video.
- **contentRating**: The rating of the content.
- **duration**: The duration of the music video.
- **editorialNotes**: The editorial notes for the music video.
- **genreNames**: The names of the music video’s associated genres.
- **genres**: The music video’s associated genres.
- **has4K**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the music video has 4K content.
- **hasHDR**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the music video has HDR10-encoded content.
- **id**: The unique identifier for the music video.
- **isPreview**: A Boolean value that indicates whether this content corresponds to a subscription video preview.
- **isrc**: The International Standard Recording Code (ISRC) for the music video.
- **lastPlayedDate**: The date when the user last played the music video on this device.
- **libraryAddedDate**: The date when the user added the music video to the library.
- **moreByArtist**: A collection of additional music videos by the artist.
- **moreInGenre**: A collection of music videos in the same genre as this music video.
- **playCount**: The number of times the user played the music video.
- **playParameters**: The parameters to use to play the music video.
- **previewAssets**: The preview assets for the music video.
- **releaseDate**: The release date (or expected prerelease date) for the music video.
- **songs**: The music video’s associated songs.
- **title**: The title of the music video.
- **trackNumber**: The music video’s number in the album’s track list.
- **url**: The URL for the music video.
- **workName**: For classical music only, the name of the associated work.

## Default Implementations

- **FilterableMusicItem Implementations**
- **MusicLibraryRequestable Implementations**

## Music Items

- **Album**: A music item that represents an album.
- **Artist**: A music item that represents an artist.
- **Curator**: A music item that represents a curator.
- **Genre**: A music item that represents a genre.
- **Playlist**: A music item that represents a playlist.
- **RadioShow**: A music item that represents a radio show.
- **RecordLabel**: A music item that represents a record label.
- **Song**: A music item that represents a song.
- **Station**: A music item that represents a station.
- **Track**: A music item that represents a track.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- FilterableMusicItem
- Hashable
- Identifiable
- MusicCatalogChartRequestable
- MusicCatalogSearchable
- MusicItem
- MusicLibraryAddable
- MusicLibraryRequestable
- MusicLibrarySearchable
- MusicPlaylistAddable
- MusicPropertyContainer
- MusicRecentlyPlayedRequestable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
